pageContext.description: Loop cracked. & edge blunted.,When found it was surrounded by a mass of Marly clay
pageContext.patina: Olive green Patina much chipped in places, showing pale green & red stains.
pageContext.other: 2 cross section drawings of palstave on reverse.,Loop centered just above stop.  Loop is intact but text shows that it is cracked. Appears to be a transverse crack on portion above stop.,Short side and mid ridges below stop, side ridges taper with a slight curve inward toward midrib.,Stop and flanges rounded almost to a socket on side-profile. Stop swept back slightly towards butt.,Flanges end slightly before butt.,Butt notched with a small v-shape.,Blade narrows just below stop then widens to edge bevel.,Edge crescent-shaped.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,F.J. Constable Curtis Esq,The Manor House, Ganarew. Monmouth.,1920
pageContext.site: England, herefordshire,ross.,1/16" below surface in garden of merrivale, ross. 1912.
